refnamediv.refpurpose: Construct functions from segments of exponential curves in breakpoint fashion.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These subroutines are used to construct functions from segments of exponential curves in breakpoint fashion.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: f # time size 25 x1 y1 x2 y2 x3 ...

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: size -- number of points in the table. Must be a power of 2 or power-of-2 plus 1 (see f statement).

x1, x2, x3, etc. -- locations in table at which to attain the following y value. Must be in increasing order. If the last value is less than size, then the rest will be set to zero. Should not be negative but can be zero.
y1, y2, y3,, etc. -- Breakpoint values attained at the location specified by the preceding x value. These must be non-zero and must be alike in sign.

note.title: Note
note.para: If p4 is positive, functions are post-normalized (rescaled to a maximum absolute value of 1 after generation). A negative p4 will cause rescaling to be skipped.
